name: 2.2.1.Final
body:
- [**closed**] invalid target release: 11 [#2294](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2294)
- [**Enhancement**] Decouple The Release Workflow [#2289](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2289)
- [**Bug**] Invalid Return Type When Subject Version Not Found [#2226](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2226)
- [**closed**] Add UI support for managing dynamic config properties [#2217](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2217)
- [**closed**] Create REST API to manage dynamic config properties (admin only) [#2216](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2216)
- [**Enhancement**] Apply dynamic config from apicurio-common-app-components to Apicurio Registry [#2215](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2215)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**] Add dynamic config option for "authenticated read access" feature [#2214](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2214)
- [**Enhancement**][**Beginner Friendly**] Add support for searching for artifacts by *existence* of property [#2187](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2187)
- [**Bug**] Version deletion bug [#2185](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2185)
- [**Documentation**][**Quality**][**Beginner Friendly**][**Seeking Contribution**] Add user-friendly explanations to the JSON compatibility checking [#2160](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2160)
- [**Bug**] Postgres error message after startup [#2124](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2124)
- [**closed**] Fix broken native image CLI workflow [#2086](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2086)
- [**Task**][**Beginner Friendly**][**Seeking Contribution**][**java**] Extract admin endpoints from the rest client to an admin client. [#2026](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2026)
- [**Enhancement**][**2.1.x**] Support per-tenant globalId and (possibly) contentId [#1813](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1813)
- [**Discussion**] Authentication/Authorization requirements [#743](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/743)
